meanings.definition: A person who writes for or works on a magazine.
meanings.sent1: The magazinists at the office were busy creating new articles.
meanings.sent2: She aspired to become a magazinist and share her stories with readers.
meanings.sent3: The magazinists had a competition to see who could write the funniest article.
meanings.sent4: In the world of magazines, the magazinists are the storytellers.
meanings.sent5: The young girl admired the magazinists for their creative writing skills.

meanings.definition: A person who is an expert in magazines.
meanings.sent1: The magazinists were called upon to provide insights on the latest magazine trends.
meanings.sent2: As a magazinist, he knew everything about the history of magazines.
meanings.sent3: The magazinists were like walking encyclopedias when it came to magazines.
meanings.sent4: She was considered a magazinist guru among her peers.
meanings.sent5: The magazinists could identify any magazine just by looking at its cover.

meanings.definition: A person who is involved in the production or distribution of magazines.
meanings.sent1: The magazinists worked tirelessly to ensure the magazines were printed on time.
meanings.sent2: He was a key player in the team of magazinists responsible for magazine distribution.
meanings.sent3: The magazinists had a strategy meeting to discuss improving magazine circulation.
meanings.sent4: The magazinists were the unsung heroes behind the scenes of the magazine industry.
meanings.sent5: Without the magazinists, magazines would never reach the hands of readers.
